cn.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

cn.description:
灵感卡片——让创意随行，捕捉您生活中的每个灵感瞬间。

这款简约实用的笔记应用，专为帮助您高效记录、整理和管理灵感而设计。无论您是在工作学习中，还是在日常生活中，小灵感都能成为您的得力助手。

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。
极简主题：提供多种极简主题，让您的笔记更美观大方，呈现出最佳阅读效果。
笔记置顶与分享：随时查看重要信息，将笔记置顶，一键分享至社交平台与好友共享创意。
字体调整：自由调整字体大小，适应不同阅读需求，提高阅读舒适度。
支持check list：流畅的原生交互体验
跨平台支持：
小灵感支持多平台（手机、平板等），后续提供实时云同步功能，确保您的笔记数据安全，随时随地访问。

快来下载灵感卡片，让创意随行，一起探索无限可能！

隐私条款：https://www.yuque.com/woshixiongda/vdwyc2/gpyq6twirk1u9w2u

cn.trackName: 扫描全能王 - 官方出品1元畅用版，扫描PDF文件，文字识别
cn.description:
扫描全能王是一款集文件扫描、图片文字提取识别、PDF 内容编辑、PDF 分割合并、PDF 转 Word、电子签名等功能于一体的智能扫描软件。自动扫描，生成高清扫描件，支持JPEG、PDF 等多格式保存，还能将扫描件一键转换为 Word/ Excel/ PPT 等多种格式文档，通过手机、平板电脑、电脑等多设备同步查看。

-----功能亮点-----
【手机扫描仪】
手机拍纸质文档，智能去除杂乱背景，生成高清JPEG、PDF文件。默认自动扫描，对准纸质文档自动拍照，解放双手。
支持多种图像优化模式，可手动调节图像参数，将纸质文件快速转为清晰的扫描件。

【图片转文字利器】
智能 OCR 识别文字，即使搜索对象是图片，也能输入关键词轻松定位，高亮显示。
支持识别中、英、日、韩、葡、法等 41 种语言，还能一键复制、编辑图片上的文字，支持导出为 Word/Text/TXT 格式。

【个人文档管家】
支持一键导入 PDF、图片、表格等多类型电子文档；标签归类，多文件夹保存，一站式管理保存工作、学习、生活中各类资料。
手机、平板、电脑等多设备端，随时同步查看管理文档。

【PDF 编辑修改】
自由组合 PDF 文档，对多个文件进行页面删除、顺序调整、插入支持、页面合并等操作。
支持一键涂抹、添加批注，轻松编辑文档；高级账户还能设置智能水印铺满，一键生成电子签名等功能，确保文档安全。

【PDF格式转换】
PDF、Word、Excel、PPT 和图像文档之间格式互相转换，一键分享或下载到本地；
格式转换后可保持文本、图像等文档的原始布局，实现版面还原。



----他们都在用扫描全能王做什么----
● 职场人士：随时扫描手边合同、公司证件、开会 PPT 等，一键保存或分享PDF，随时查找翻阅，非常给力的办公软件
● 学生：课堂扫描笔记、白板、PPT，复习找资料快速又方便；线上提交纸质材料、个人证件扫描件，高清又专业
● 老师：扫描课堂白板内容、学生考卷错题整理，发给家长同步教学进度，老师用心家长安心
● 医生：疑难病症资料随时扫描记录，同行交流会议 PPT 留存，整理留档，也方便给其他医院科室共同交流
● 设计师：扫描保存设计手稿，一键提取线稿，随时捕捉灵感初现时的大胆想象
……

-----升级高级帐户，享更多强大功能-----
● 纸质文档一键转换 Word/Excel，轻松整理各类报表报告；
● 拍图识字，提取图片或扫描件中的文字，一键复制导出，快速整理资料；
● PDF 加密、添加电子签名、一键铺满水印等，分享协作高效安全；
● 支持身份证、护照、企业三证、户口本等近百种证件扫描，1：1 生成高清扫描件，可用于证照资料提交、电子开户等；
● 10G 超大云空间，文件夹分类标签管理，查找使用更方便。

一经确认购买订阅产品，iTunes会直接扣除相关订阅所需费用。

扫描全能王高级帐户可通过iTunes帐户信用卡直接付费订购。若当前订购周期（一个月／一年）结束前24小时内仍未取消续订，将会自动续订下个周期的高级帐户。

在当前订购周期内，无法取消当前周期的使用。您可以通过iTunes帐户的设置来管理或取消购买。

您的试用会立即结束，如果您付费购买了产品内的订阅。
关于服务条款：
https://www.camscanner.com/app/service?language=zh-cn
关于隐私政策：
https://www.camscanner.com/app/privacy?language=zh-cn

----使用建议----
为确保你能获得清晰的扫描图，请在拍照时：
● 光线充足，尽量避免抖动
● 尽量使图片占满拍摄屏幕

若你喜欢扫描全能王，或者有其他任何意见，请花一点时间给我们写评论，或发邮件至isupport@camscanner.com，这将帮助我们不断改进产品，给你更好的使用体验！

为您精选和测试的实践！

一次呼吸，一步一步地改变您的生活！
每个练习都是通往更平衡、更有韧性的自我的一块垫脚石。与BreatheIn一起征服压力，焕发您的身体，找到您的中心！

hk.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

hk.releaseNotes:
We’ve been working under the hood to make Controller even smarter and more intuitive – and this update lays important groundwork for the future!

New Features & Improvements
* Smarter Metadata: We’ve introduced a new metadata structure behind the scenes, paving the way for exciting future features.
* Accessory Sorting: You can now sort not only rooms but also individual accessories – making your setup more organized than ever.
* Unique Accessory Names: Controller now helps you automatically avoid duplicate names for devices, keeping things clear and conflict-free.
* Better Naming with Room Prefixes: If you’re using room-based name prefixes, you’ll notice improved handling when moving accessories or renaming rooms.
* Navigate to Rooms Faster: From the accessory details, you can now jump directly to the room view for quicker navigation.

Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where some users couldn’t select characteristics when creating service groups.
* Resolved a bug where camera streams failed to load correctly for some users.
* Many smaller improvements under the hood to make the app more stable and reliable.

Update now and enjoy a cleaner, smarter experience with Controller for HomeKit! As always, your feedback helps us make the app even better – thank you!
hk.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。

hk.description:
Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing.

Rediscover Calm and Energy

Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal.

Expertly Curated Practices

We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today!

Seamless Apple Health Integration

Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey.

Explore a Range of Techniques

- Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind.
- Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster.
- Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique.
- Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement.
- Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time

Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!

hk.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

hk.trackName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
hk.description:
Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! 

Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. 

Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. 

Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play!

Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! 

Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic!


HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®:

Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). 
Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this!
Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route.
When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! 


FEATURES
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session!
PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days.
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.
hk.trackCensoredName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

mo.trackCensoredName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
mo.trackName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
mo.description:
Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! 

Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. 

Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. 

Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play!

Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! 

Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic!


HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®:

Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). 
Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this!
Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route.
When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! 


FEATURES
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session!
PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days.
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.
經典迷宮遊戲是一款經典的益智遊戲，非常適合在短暫休息時訓練您的大腦。它設計為一款非常簡單的單人遊戲，透過滑過有趣的復古迷宮來玩。快速玩一局，挑戰 500 個迷宮，成為迷宮之王。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。

選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服

Money Pro 讓您集中規劃帳單、預算，並記錄帳號活動。 Money Pro 非常適合規劃家庭預算。

可輕鬆同步資料，iPhone/iPad 版本完全整合。Money Pro 是新一代的 Money 應用程式（全球下載超過 200 萬次）。

功能

行事曆
- 在每月行事曆標示帳單到期日
- 可設定自定週期的重複性帳單
- 可在行事曆上選取日期，以便篩選交易資料

今日檢視
- 一看就知道哪些帳單到期
- 如果您有實際交易，可快速進行

- 快速重新排程選項可協助您處理到期帳單（明天、3 天後、下週）

- 設定重複交易或只會出現一次的交易
- 餘額變動記錄
- 可用於整理記錄的其他欄位，包括收款人、說明、支票編號、等級（個人/出差開銷）
- 收據照片附件

帳戶調節
- 您可先記錄交易資料，以後再清除 (調節)
- 自動計算可用餘額和清算的餘額

網路銀行 (GOLD 訂購)
- 趕快連結銀行並下載個人財務資料

輸入銀行對帳單 
- 輸入交易記錄並讓個人帳戶永遠保持在最新狀態（支援檔案：.ofx, .csv）
- Money Pro 可學習您的交易分類邏輯，並預測所輸入交易的類別

交易分割
- 您可將一筆交易分成多種類別。當您在多家大型賣場購物並且一次支付多筆款項時，這項功能會非常有用

計算機和貨幣轉換工具
- 可在您規劃預算時計算金額
- 只要輸入交易資料就能迅速轉換貨幣

搜尋
- 可根據金額、類別、說明、收款人等等條件搜尋交易記錄

詳細報表
- 收入/花費
- 現金流
- 交易
- 資產/負債（資本淨值）
- 預期餘額 
- 日/週/月/年趨勢圖表

多種自定選項
- 規劃預算和支付帳單時可使用自定週期功能（每週、每雙週、每月等等）
- 根據個人需求調整收支類別和子類別的結構
- 內建 1,500 多種圖示，可供帳戶和類別自定之用
- 可使用照片製作專屬圖示

Money Pro 同步 (PLUS 或 GOLD 訂閱方案)
- 和其他使用者在不同裝置上一起追蹤開銷 *（跨平台和全家人資料雲端同步）

資料備份
- Money Pro 可在關鍵時刻自動備份資料
- 不過您也可以手動製作備份

多個設定檔
- 您可以設置多個個人資料，並分別跟踪您的個人和家庭財務

更多
- 可列印和匯出為 pdf、qif、csv 格式
- 密碼保護
- 設定和追蹤財務目標 (GOLD 訂購)
- 在擴增實境中檢視報告 (GOLD 訂購)
- 支援多種貨幣，並可自動更新匯率
- 自動 iCloud 同步 (iPad、iPhone、Mac)

PLUS
- 1 個月的PLUS服務: $4.99

GOLD
- 1 個月的 GOLD 服務: $9.99

除了美國以外，其他國家∕地區的實際費用都會自動轉換成當地貨幣。
我們會在您確定購買時向 iTunes 帳號扣款。系統將自動續約，除非您在當期結束至少 24 小時前關閉自動續約功能。系統將在當期結束前的 24 小時內向帳號扣款續約。若要管理訂閱方案以及關閉自動續約功能，使用者必須在購買後前往帳號設定專區。您無法在訂閱生效期間取消訂閱。若提供免費試用期，使用者一旦在試用期結束前付費訂閱，視同放棄剩餘的試用時間。

條款和隱私權
- http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html
- http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html

使用手冊
https://money.pro/tw/guide/

Money Pro 是通用型應用程式， 只要購買一次即可在 iPhone 和 iPad 上使用。

tw.description:
在行動裝置上體驗飛行的快感！
只要用行動裝置就能沉浸在引人入勝的航空世界中，運用最先進的科技輕鬆體驗駕駛飛機的刺激與挑戰。

即刻在世界各地起飛！
學習如何起飛、降落、完成航班。體驗3D的即時駕駛艙，造訪30個HD機場，並在500個SD機場起降。個人化各式工具、運用自動飛行計畫，在世界各地體驗最精湛的細節。試試教學，精進你的技巧！

手冊／教學：wiki.realflightsimulator.org/wiki

想解鎖《Real Flight Simulator》的所有功能嗎？歡迎根據自己的需求挑選月度、半年度或年度訂閱方案！

繫好安全帶，化身真正的飛行員！遊戲中可以體驗：

-超過50個飛機型號，包含精細的3D駕駛艙、完整運作的零件和燈光。感受現實的駕駛系統和工具。還有全新型號即將登場！
-超過30個HD機場，包含3D建築、載具、跑道和流程。未來還將推出更多機場！
-即時航班搭配即時氣象變化。大型國際機場每天吞吐四萬班即時航班和流量。
-起降流程包含縝密的檢查清單，讓你身歷其境體驗飛行員的工作。
-降落後可享用各式地勤系統，包含乘客載具、加油和緊急服務。
-透過進階飛行計畫工具自訂航班的天氣、故障等豐富選項。和同事分享飛行計畫，一起共享自己的體驗。
-可啟用自動駕駛，以便一心多用，長途航班也能使用自動降落系統。
-配備寫實衛星地形圖和精準的等高線地圖，方便探索全世界。

在多人模式中和全球社群互動
-加入數百名其他飛行員，與世界各地一起飛行。
-在多人模式中和其他飛行員聊天、參與每週社群活動，並加入虛擬航空公司，成為飛行點數最多的航空公司。

航管模式：成為航空交通管制員
-航空交通管制（航管）模式：安排飛機交通、給予指示，引導飛行員安全、有效地飛行。
-體驗可互動的多語音航管流程和通訊，探索《RFS》的所有頻道。

打造並分享你對航空的熱愛
-設計自己的飛機塗裝，並和全球玩家分享。
-建造你最愛的HD機場，並欣賞其他飛行員在其中起飛。
-成為飛機攝影師，探索各類遊戲內相機，捕捉精采飛行畫面。在夜空中翱翔時體驗浪漫的都市夜景，欣賞日夜之際陽光在雲朵間交錯的縹緲美景。把你精美的航空作品分享到官方社群媒體頻道。
-加入日益茁壯的《Real Flight Simulator》社群，探索新飛行路線，和不斷成長的飛行愛好團體互動。

需有網際網路連線才能獲得完整的飛行體驗。

準備好翱翔天際。
繫好安全帶，做好準備，在《RFS》中成為真正的飛行員！

使用条款： https://www.rortos.com/terms-of-use/
 客服：rfs@rortos.com

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

tw.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？


--------

tw.description:
1985年，一場無法挽回的災難降臨——核戰爭和致命病毒的爆發導致了世界末日，將整個世界變成了一片巨大的放射性荒原，充斥著突變體、掠奪者和瘋子（他們比任何僵尸都可怕）。蘇聯在核打擊中崩潰，整個世界變成了一個每個人都在為生存而戰的競技場。

在一個充滿輻射和怪物的世界中生存並不容易。如今，在昔日世界的廢墟上，暴力、飢餓和疾病統治著一切。作為一名幸存者，你必須在這個對生命充滿敵意的開放世界中適應環境，並尋找和拯救你的家人——也許他們在這場混亂中幸存了下來？……

危險與冒險在每一個轉角等著你。作為一名潛行者，你需要在輻射水平比切爾諾貝利災難還要高數倍的廢棄城市中搜尋物資，並在充滿嗜血突變體和僵尸瘋子的森林中穿行。在這片混亂與廢墟中，你必須運用所有的生存技能，獨自為生命而戰！

《Day R Survival》不僅僅是一款游戲，而是一款真實的核末日生存模擬游戲，背景設定在1985年蘇聯的廣闊而真實的地圖上。

《Day R Survival》的RPG和任務系統是一款硬核的生存模擬RPG。核戰爭和致命病毒（比任何僵尸病毒都可怕）不僅會給你帶來強大而狡猾的敵人，還會讓你面臨艱難的選擇。游戲中的任務充滿了陰暗的氛圍和絕望，人們不得不在昔日世界的廢墟上掙扎求生。


廣闊的開放世界
在1985年蘇聯的逼真地圖上，探索超過2700個廢棄城市。這些城市充滿了資源、危險（如突變體、野生動物和瘋狂的僵尸）以及未解之謎。你可以在森林中狩獵，在河流中釣魚，或是掠奪資源——在這個世界裡，你的生存策略沒有任何限制！

物品制作
數百種真實的制作配方：從日常用品到頂級軍用交通工具和彈藥。你擁有機械、化學、物理或生存方面的知識嗎？現在是時候運用它們了！

在殘酷世界中掙扎求生
你隻是一個普通人，需要食物、水和休息。你會染上疾病，傷口也不會自行愈合。尋找食物，爭奪每一滴干淨的水，建造避難所，並時刻保持警惕——在這個世界上，哪怕是一隻老鼠，都可能要了你的命！


單人模式與多人聯機
你可以獨自挑戰任務，也可以與朋友並肩作戰——隨時在單人和多人模式之間切換，選擇最適合你的生存方式。打造獨特的生存策略，或與志同道合的玩家聯手，通過聊天交流、交易物資，並在末世荒原中共同完成任務，尋找生存的希望。


游戲特色  
在線與離線模式
多人在線生存，與好友組隊挑戰末世危機
難度選擇：簡單、普通、困難，適應不同生存策略
技能成長與強化
動態環境：四季更迭、晝夜交替、輻射水平不斷變化
敵人與資源隨機刷新
逼真廢土氛圍，沉浸式核戰后世界生存挑戰


幸存者！體驗最真實的生存模擬游戲之一——Day R Survival。制定你的生存策略，揭開末日世界的重重謎團，努力活下去！

tw.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

tw.trackName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
tw.description:
Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! 

Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. 

Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. 

Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play!

Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! 

Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic!


HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®:

Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). 
Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this!
Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route.
When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! 


FEATURES
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session!
PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days.
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.
tw.trackCensoredName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers.

The galaxy needs the Iron Marines

More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

us.description:
灵感卡片——让创意随行，捕捉您生活中的每个灵感瞬间。

这款简约实用的笔记应用，专为帮助您高效记录、整理和管理灵感而设计。无论您是在工作学习中，还是在日常生活中，小灵感都能成为您的得力助手。

主要功能：

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。
极简主题：提供多种极简主题，让您的笔记更美观大方，呈现出最佳阅读效果。
笔记置顶与分享：随时查看重要信息，将笔记置顶，一键分享至社交平台与好友共享创意。
字体调整：自由调整字体大小，适应不同阅读需求，提高阅读舒适度。
支持check list：流畅的原生交互体验

us.releaseNotes:
小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据
us.description:

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

us.description:
Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. 

Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity
• Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents—perfect for your next important meeting.
• Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes.
• Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail.
• Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations.
• Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration.
• Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices.
• New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes—all without switching tools.
• Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes.
• Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV.

Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools
• Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information.
• Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting.
• Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly.
• Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations.
• Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition.
• No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones.
• Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions
• Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster.

Enhance Creative Digital Planning
• Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style.
• Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook.
• Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity.
• Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners.
• Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search.
• Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription.
• Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours.

Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today.

Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! 

Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. 

Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. 

Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play!

Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! 

Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic!


HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®:

Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). 
Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this!
Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route.
When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! 


FEATURES
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session!
PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days.
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.

us.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

tr.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

tr.description:
Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. 

The war is ‘over’ - but we all know that doesn’t mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power!

Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‘Plague Inc.’ - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency.

◈◈◈ #1 top paid game globally ◈◈◈

▶ “Rebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.” - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security
▶ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics
▶ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims
▶ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com
▶ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review
▶ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review
▶ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review
▶ "Unlike anything I’ve played on here before" - App Store review

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions
● Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics 
● Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research
● Intelligent strategic and tactical AI
● Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions
● 8 unique governors with radically different abilities
● Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode
● Play new generated Challenges every week
● 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system
● Full Save/Load functionality
● Internet connectivity not required

An important note:
Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments.

Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian.

Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game!

◈◈◈

I’ve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see.
James (the designer)

tr.description:
From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real-time strategy sci-fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas, and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids, and robot armies in a galaxy far far away.

PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers.

ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers.

RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities.

TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons.

Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command.

The galaxy needs the Iron Marines

FEATURES

• 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy!
• 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space.
• 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more.
• +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower!
• 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What’s better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles!
• DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well… some are machines and these aliens aren’t green… but they’re all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines!
• 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you’re the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy!
• NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed!
• CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don’t get cocky! Or Do! Your choice!
• IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

tr.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tr.trackCensoredName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
tr.trackName: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
tr.description:
Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! 

Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. 

Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. 

Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play!

Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! 

Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic!


HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®:

Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). 
Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this!
Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route.
When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! 


FEATURES
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session!
PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days.
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

tr.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

tr.description:
Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing.

Rediscover Calm and Energy

Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal.

Expertly Curated Practices

We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today!

Seamless Apple Health Integration

Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey.

Explore a Range of Techniques

- Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind.
- Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster.
- Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique.
- Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement.
- Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time

Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!
